Background Context: Law student worried about exams and future career
Treatment Goals: Learn to control worrying and reduce physical tension

Background Context: Recently laid off from a long-term job and have suicide ideation
Treatment Goals: Crisis stabilization, safety plan, find motivation to get out of bed and start job searching, antidepressant evaluation

Background Context: Software developer who avoids team meetings and social events
Treatment Goals: Be able to speak in meetings without panic and make new friends

Background Context: Experiences intrusive thoughts about contamination
Treatment Goals: Reduce time spent on cleaning rituals and tolerate uncertainty

Background Context: Emergency room nurse working excessive overtime
Treatment Goals: Establish work-life balance and find joy in life again

Background Context: Had a panic attack while driving and now fears recurrence
Treatment Goals: Be able to drive on the highway again without panicking

Background Context: Was bitten by a dog as a child
Treatment Goals: Be able to walk in the park or visit friends with dogs

Background Context: Survivor of long-term childhood emotional abuse
Treatment Goals: Process traumatic memories and build a stable sense of self

Background Context: In a long-term relationship with escalating repetitive arguments
Treatment Goals: Improve communication and decide on the future of the partnership

Background Context: Lost her spouse to a sudden illness six months ago, having suicide ideation
Treatment Goals: Process the grief and find a way to move forward alone

Background Context: Struggles to fall asleep and stay asleep for months
Treatment Goals: Develop a regular sleep schedule and sleep through the night

Background Context: A college male student who reports overwhelming guilt after failing a major course. Is now having persistent sadness, loss of motivation, difficulty sleeping, and self-critical thoughts, further self-harming
Treatment Goals: Coping strategies, cognitive reframing of perfectionism, identifying triggers, developing support systems.

Background Context: Experiences intense mood swings and anger outbursts
Treatment Goals: Learn to manage emotions without lashing out at others

Background Context: Frequenly checks body for signs of illness and researches symptoms
Treatment Goals: Trust their body and reduce reassurance-seeking from doctors

Background Context: New parent struggling with loss of identity and freedom
Treatment Goals: Adapt to the new role as a parent and find time for self-care

Background Context: Feels like an imposter at work despite good performance reviews
Treatment Goals: Internalize positive feedback and challenge the inner critic

Background Context: Has felt 'low' and unmotivated for several years
Treatment Goals: Identify personal values and engage in meaningful activities

Background Context: History of road rage and conflicts at work
Treatment Goals: Identify anger triggers and learn de-escalation techniques

Background Context: Has chronic back pain that doctors cannot fully explain
Treatment Goals: Learn to manage pain flare-ups and increase daily activity

Background Context: Recently retired CEO who feels lost and purposeless
Treatment Goals: Explore new hobbies and find a new sense of purpose

Background Context: Obsessed with perceived flaws in their facial appearance
Treatment Goals: Reduce mirror-checking and engage in social activities

Background Context: New mother who feels disconnected from her baby
Treatment Goals: Bond with the baby and manage feelings of sadness

Background Context: In a severe car accident three months ago
Treatment Goals: Reduce intrusive memories and stop avoiding the crash location

Background Context: Adult with diagnosed ADHD struggles with executive function
Treatment Goals: Break down large tasks and develop better organizational systems

Background Context: Teenager constantly fighting with parents about rules and school
Treatment Goals: Improve communication with parents and negotiate for more independence

Background Context: Started college far from home and feels homesick
Treatment Goals: Reframe homesickness as normal and engage in campus activities

Background Context: Small business owner whose profits have dropped significantly
Treatment Goals: Develop a realistic budget and challenge catastrophic financial predictions

Background Context: Experiences significant fatigue and low mood every winter
Treatment Goals: Implement light therapy and increase scheduled pleasant activities during winter

Background Context: Teen constantly compares their body to social media influencers
Treatment Goals: Reduce social media use and focus on body neutrality/function

Background Context: Construction worker struggles to quit vaping due to cravings/stress
Treatment Goals: Identify triggers and develop coping skills for cravings and stress

Background Context: Avoids intimacy due to fear of not being able to perform
Treatment Goals: Challenge rigid performance expectations and focus on sensual connection

Background Context: Constantly worries about past minor mistakes being unforgivable sins
Treatment Goals: Reduce rumination and learn to accept uncertainty about moral perfection

Background Context: Talented artist who hasn't created anything in three years
Treatment Goals: Identify core artistic values and commit to small consistent creative actions

Background Context: Feels constantly undermined and disrespected by a specific coworker
Treatment Goals: Learn assertive communication and establish firm boundaries at work

Background Context: Experiences frequent tension headaches exacerbated by stress
Treatment Goals: Implement relaxation techniques (PMR) and reduce cognitive stress load

Background Context: Constantly yells at their 3-year-old and feels guilty afterward
Treatment Goals: Learn and implement positive parenting techniques and manage personal frustration

Background Context: Hasn't seen a dentist in five years due to past trauma
Treatment Goals: Use systematic desensitization to gradually approach the idea of a dental visit

Background Context: Middle-aged person navigating life as a single individual after long marriage
Treatment Goals: Re-establish personal identity separate from the marriage role

Background Context: Racks up credit card debt due to compulsive online shopping as a mood booster
Emotional State: Brief excitement followed by guilt dread
Treatment Goals: Identify emotional triggers for spending and implement 'delay-and-distract' strategies

Background Context: Philosophy student preoccupied with the meaninglessness of life and death
Treatment Goals: Re-focus energy on finding personal meaning within a finite life

Background Context: Recently released from prison struggles to reconnect and find work
Treatment Goals: Build a network of support and practice social/job interviewing skills

Background Context: Spends 6+ hours a day scrolling leading to academic neglect
Treatment Goals: Implement digital detox boundaries and replace scrolling with valued activities

Background Context: Avoids eating out or traveling due to intense fear of getting sick
Treatment Goals: Challenge safety behaviors and confront fear of bodily sensations

Background Context: Cares for an aging parent with Alzheimer's and has no time for self
Treatment Goals: Establish clear boundaries for caregiving and schedule self-care without guilt

Background Context: Carried deep-seated anger at an absent parent for decades
Treatment Goals: Explore how past anger impacts present relationships and practice forgiveness

Background Context: Breaks up with partners quickly over minor flaws fearing disappointment
Treatment Goals: Challenge the 'all-or-nothing' core belief about romantic partners

Background Context: Stays up late playing video games to avoid thinking about the next workday
Treatment Goals: Establish a consistent wind-down routine and confront anxieties about work

Background Context: History of non-suicidal self-injury during intense emotional distress
Treatment Goals: Learn distress tolerance and emotion regulation skills

Background Context: Business professional who needs to give presentations but panics
Treatment Goals: Use systematic desensitization and cognitive restructuring to challenge fears of judgment

Background Context: Prioritizes volatile partner's needs above their own leading to emotional exhaustion
Treatment Goals: Define and practice healthy boundaries in the relationship

Background Context: Young man spends 3+ hours daily at the gym and uses supplements
Treatment Goals: Reduce compulsive gym attendance and challenge beliefs about physical inadequacy

Background Context: University professor unable to select a research topic fearing the 'wrong' choice
Treatment Goals: Set a firm deadline for topic selection and practice tolerating uncertainty

Background Context: Experiences persistent unexplained exhaustion impacting daily functioning
Treatment Goals: Increase energy pacing skills and gently reintroduce valued activities

Background Context: Recently retired school principal feels loss of routine and social connections
Treatment Goals: Identify new social groups and commit to 3 structured weekly activities

Background Context: A 17-year-old with cannabis and alcohol misuse. Recently suspended from school, conflict with parents.
Treatment Goals: Motivational interviewing, substance counseling, supportive therapy, suicide-risk monitoring.

Background Context: Fears flying so intensely they haven't visited family overseas in 10 years
Treatment Goals: Use virtual reality exposure and cognitive restructuring on flight safety

Background Context: Cheated on their spouse years ago and still feels crushing self-loathing
Treatment Goals: Practice self-compassion and focus on living aligned with values today

Background Context: Constantly focuses on minor inconveniences alienating friends and family
Treatment Goals: Identify the function of complaining and increase gratitude/solution focus

Background Context: Custodial parent struggles to establish authority with a defiant stepchild
Treatment Goals: Learn consistent boundary-setting and improve communication with co-parent

Background Context: Successful tech executive realizes their career doesn't bring meaning
Treatment Goals: Explore core personal values and begin aligning time/resources with those values

Background Context: Obsessively washes hands and avoids public transit due to fear of germs
Treatment Goals: Reduce washing rituals (ERP) and challenge overestimation of threat

Background Context: Engages in secret uncontrolled overeating followed by intense self-hatred
Treatment Goals: Identify emotional triggers for bingeing and learn alternative coping skills

Background Context: Highly skilled mechanic refuses promotions believing they are not "smart enough"
Treatment Goals: Challenge the 'Imposter Syndrome' belief and practice accepting praise

Background Context: Devastated and unable to function since the death of their long-term pet
Treatment Goals: Process the significant attachment and loss; find ways to honor the memory

Background Context: Felt consistently "flat" and joyless for over five years but manages to work
Treatment Goals: Identify small goals to increase daily engagement and challenge negative predictions

Background Context: Novelist paralyzed by the fear their next book won't be well-received
Treatment Goals: Break down the writing task into tiny manageable steps and reward completion

Background Context: Shuts down completely during arguments leading to partner frustration
Treatment Goals: Learn to tolerate emotional activation and practice expressing needs calmly

Background Context: High school teacher overwhelmed by administrative load and student needs
Treatment Goals: Establish clear professional boundaries and prioritize self-care activities

Background Context: Avoids dating apps and first dates due to intense fear of rejection
Treatment Goals: Practice exposure to social situations (starting with low-stakes interaction)

Background Context: Difficulty discarding possessions leading to an unusable living space
Treatment Goals: Practice small discarding exposures (ERP) and challenge the attachment to objects

Background Context: Saw a traumatic event as a child resulting in persistent hypervigilance
Treatment Goals: Use trauma processing techniques to reduce intrusive memories and hyperarousal

Background Context: Sleeps well on weekends but worries about sleep before important workdays
Treatment Goals: Reduce time in bed when awake and challenge performance beliefs about sleep

Background Context: Expresses frustration indirectly leading to unresolved conflicts/resentment
Treatment Goals: Learn direct assertive and non-hostile communication techniques

Background Context: Recent college graduate with stable job constantly worried about future debt
Treatment Goals: Identify and challenge all-or-nothing thinking about money; practice budgeting

Background Context: Obsessed with minor perceived hair thinning spending hours on coverage/mirror checks
Treatment Goals: Reduce mirror checking and grooming rituals; engage in social activities without camouflaging

Background Context: Supports an adult child financially and emotionally who refuses to find work
Treatment Goals: Establish firm loving boundaries and prioritize their own financial stability

Background Context: Convinced they have a rare heart condition despite medical tests
Treatment Goals: Reduce reassurance-seeking from doctors/internet and accept uncertainty about health

Background Context: Mother of three feels purposeless now that her children have left home
Treatment Goals: Explore personal passions and volunteer work to find a new sense of purpose

Background Context: Constant stress due to criticism and interference from their spouse's family
Treatment Goals: Improve communication with the spouse and create a united front with in-laws

Background Context: Holds onto the belief that they are fundamentally "unlikable" due to past bullying
Treatment Goals: Identify and challenge the negative core belief; practice self-compassion

Background Context: Has opportunity to switch careers but is intensely fearful of failure
Treatment Goals: Explore pros and cons (MI-style) and commit to a small reversible step toward change

Background Context: High school student trying to quit vaping before college admissions
Treatment Goals: Develop substitute coping skills for stress and identify supportive peers

Background Context: Adult survivor of emotional neglect struggles with emotional regulation/self-soothing
Treatment Goals: Build emotional regulation skills and develop a stable sense of self-worth

Background Context: Avoids elevators subways and crowded rooms impacting urban life
Treatment Goals: Create a hierarchy of feared situations and use gradual exposure (ERP)

Background Context: New father struggles with intense intrusive fears about the baby's safety
Treatment Goals: Use CBT to challenge intrusive thoughts and practice grounding techniques

Background Context: Refuses to go to physical therapy for an old injury leading to worsening pain
Treatment Goals: Explore the values compromised by avoidance (ACT) and set small engagement goals

Background Context: Spends excessive time re-checking emails before sending slowing down job
Treatment Goals: Implement time limits for tasks and practice accepting minor imperfections

Background Context: Constant neck pain that flares up with stress leading to mood deterioration
Treatment Goals: Practice mindfulness (MBCT) to change relationship with pain sensations

Background Context: Laid off unexpectedly after 15 years; feels shock anger and loss of identity
Treatment Goals: Process the loss of the professional role and negotiate this new transition phase

Background Context: Gets close to achieving goals and then ruins them
Treatment Goals: Identify the underlying fears that drive self-sabotaging behavior (Schema)

Background Context: Frequent outbursts of road rage yelling at other drivers and high stress
Treatment Goals: Identify cognitive distortions and implement coping mechanisms

Background Context: Security guard working rotating shifts struggles to maintain consistent sleep
Treatment Goals: Implement strict sleep hygiene rules tailored to shift changes (CBT-I)

Background Context: Moved jobs and fears eating lunch in the communal breakroom alone
Treatment Goals: Use behavioral experiments (CBT) to test catastrophic predictions about lunch

Background Context: Siblings fighting constantly over the financial and physical care of elderly parent
Treatment Goals: Facilitate communication to create a sustainable agreed-upon care plan

Background Context: Veteran experiencing flashbacks and extreme startle responses years after service
Treatment Goals: Utilize trauma processing techniques to reduce the intensity of flashbacks

Background Context: Travels constantly but feels disconnected and unable to stick to any routine or goal
Treatment Goals: Establish small consistent self-care routines regardless of location

Background Context: Misinterprets normal body sensations as signs of impending doom
Treatment Goals: Practice interoceptive exposure (ERP principles) to face uncomfortable sensations

Background Context: Overly critical of their partner's habits leading to constant nitpicking and tension
Treatment Goals: Learn to accept their partner's imperfections and focus on mutual appreciation

Background Context: Debating quitting challenging grad program due to stress/fear of not measuring up
Treatment Goals: Explore the values supporting both staying and leaving (MI) to clarify the decision

Background Context: Reacts to any perceived criticism with intense anger or shame
Treatment Goals: Learn distress tolerance skills and challenge all-or-nothing responses to feedback

Background Context: Engineer needs every detail planned out to feel safe leading to rigid behavior
Treatment Goals: Reduce mental review/rehearsal and practice tolerating unexpected events

Background Context: Experiences mood reactivity weight gain and hypersomnia
Treatment Goals: Increase behavioral engagement despite lack of initial motivation

Background Context: Avoids asking for a raise or feedback due to fear of being judged negatively
Treatment Goals: Practice assertive communication in low-stakes scenarios first

Background Context: Spends hours arranging objects on a desk and re-entering rooms perfectly
Treatment Goals: Engage in deliberate 'messing up' (ERP) and reduce checking behavior

Background Context: Feels emotionally drained by high patient demands and bureaucracy
Treatment Goals: Re-establish professional meaning (values-based ACT) and set firm hours

Background Context: Stopped leaving their house after a series of panic attacks in public
Treatment Goals: Gradually increase time spent outside the home starting with the yard

Background Context: Construction worker who fears heights jeopardizing their job
Treatment Goals: Use systematic desensitization (VR or imagination) to challenge fear

Background Context: Difficulty saying no due to a core belief their worth depends on pleasing others
Treatment Goals: Learn to identify personal needs and practice assertive boundary setting

Background Context: Couple struggling to rebuild trust after one partner had a long-term affair
Treatment Goals: Establish radical honesty and improve emotional repair skills

Background Context: Lost their childhood home due to foreclosure leading to profound sadness
Treatment Goals: Process the symbolic loss and create a sense of 'home' in their current space

Background Context: Lays awake for hours focusing on mistakes made during the day
Treatment Goals: Implement 'worry time' before bed and use cognitive defusion techniques

Background Context: If they can't do a task perfectly they won't attempt it at all
Treatment Goals: Challenge the 'all-or-nothing' rule and seek feedback on 'B' quality work

Background Context: Sudden intense fits of anger when feeling invalidated or disrespected
Treatment Goals: Use DBT skill chain analysis to prevent the escalation of anger

Background Context: Obsessively reads about specific cancers and interprets minor aches as terminal symptoms
Treatment Goals: Reduce internet searches and practice exposure to uncertainty

Background Context: Finished university and feels overwhelmed by the lack of structure and direction
Treatment Goals: Identify small achievable goals for job search and self-care

Background Context: Believes they are unattractive and avoids photos or video calls
Treatment Goals: Challenge distorted views of appearance and increase self-compassion

Background Context: Finds no pleasure in activities they used to love (e.g. music hobbies)
Treatment Goals: Schedule time for previously enjoyable activities regardless of initial feeling

Background Context: Frequently snaps at their boss or direct reports when feeling stressed
Treatment Goals: Learn to take a 'time out' before responding and practice objective labeling of emotions

Background Context: Experiences widespread pain and difficulty focusing
Treatment Goals: Use acceptance strategies for the pain and gentle movement to increase function

Background Context: Recently moved to a new country struggles with language culture and isolation
Treatment Goals: Build social connections in the new community and validate cultural adjustment stress

Background Context: Obsessed with perceived flaws (acne scars wrinkles) and uses excessive makeup
Treatment Goals: Reduce camouflaging and challenge beliefs about flawless appearance

Background Context: Depression exacerbated by increased arguments and lack of support from partner
Treatment Goals: Improve communication with partner and identify resources for social support

Background Context: Witnessed a severe injury to a coworker and now has jumpiness and recurrent images
Treatment Goals: Use structured trauma narrative and cognitive restructuring

Background Context: Stalls on major life decisions (e.g. signing a lease buying a car) until forced to act
Treatment Goals: Use a decision matrix and commit to making choices quickly

Background Context: Parents dealing with a child who is both victim and sometimes perpetrator of bullying
Treatment Goals: Establish firm family rules regarding respect and seek school collaboration

Background Context: Constantly worries about the safety and well-being of their aging parents
Treatment Goals: Practice 'externalizing' the worry and setting time limits for it

Background Context: Developed depression after a debilitating sports injury left them immobile
Treatment Goals: Set realistic incremental physical and social activity goals

Background Context: Avoids eating in front of others due to fear of being watched or judged
Treatment Goals: Use gradual exposure to eating in public settings (ERP principles)

Background Context: Intrusive distressing doubts about the quality/suitability of their long-term partner
Treatment Goals: Learn to accept doubt about the relationship without acting on it

Background Context: Overwhelmed by the emotional weight of their work and insufficient resources
Treatment Goals: Set realistic expectations for impact and increase emotional detachment at home

Background Context: Had a panic attack on a train and now avoids all forms of public transportation
Treatment Goals: Use controlled breathing and cognitive defusion while taking short train rides

Background Context: Avoids hiking or camping because of the extreme fear of snakes
Treatment Goals: Use virtual exposure to images/videos of snakes

Background Context: Experiences sudden intense overwhelm and inability to think logically when stressed
Treatment Goals: Learn grounding techniques and distress tolerance skills

Background Context: Couple where one partner is highly expressive and the other is totally withdrawn
Treatment Goals: Learn active listening skills and "I" statements

Background Context: Caring for a terminally ill family member struggling with the impending loss
Treatment Goals: Validate the sadness and focus on maximizing positive time together now

Background Context: Spends hours reading watching TV and working in bed
Treatment Goals: Restrict the bed to only sleep and intimacy (Stimulus Control Therapy)

Background Context: Links every mistake directly to a core belief they are fundamentally worthless
Treatment Goals: Challenge the core belief and practice self-compassion for errors

Background Context: Quickly escalates conflicts due to feeling easily attacked
Treatment Goals: Practice mindful observation of triggers and non-judgmental response

Background Context: Obsessed with food safety and expiration dates throwing out food
Treatment Goals: Gradually increase tolerance for food that is "safe enough"

Background Context: Moved back in with parents after a job loss and feels like a failure
Treatment Goals: Identify small areas of independence and set a timeline for moving out

Background Context: Constantly criticized by parents leading to intense fear of making any mistake now
Treatment Goals: Internalize counter-evidence and seek supportive relationships

Background Context: Feels that no matter what they do they will always be poor and unhappy
Treatment Goals: Identify and challenge negative predictions about the future

Background Context: History of impulsive aggressive driving behaviors
Treatment Goals: Use cognitive restructuring to challenge 'entitlement' thoughts on the road

Background Context: Dealing with pain that is expected to worsen over time
Treatment Goals: Focus on present moment experience and valued living despite pain (ACT)

Background Context: Overwhelmed and anxious by constant political and social turmoil
Treatment Goals: Limit news exposure and focus energy on local meaningful action

Background Context: Obsessed with the size and shape of their nose considering expensive surgery
Treatment Goals: Reduce time spent checking and comparing appearance to others

Background Context: Depression heavily tied to severe sleep deprivation due to a difficult baby
Treatment Goals: Prioritize maximizing sleep and behavioral activation when awake

Background Context: Survivor of sexual assault experiencing nightmares and avoidance behaviors
Treatment Goals: Use exposure therapy (written or narrative) to process the trauma memory safely

Background Context: Freelancer working from home lacks schedule and accountability
Treatment Goals: Implement a strict daily schedule and external accountability measures

Background Context: Two adult siblings constantly compete over success and parental approval
Treatment Goals: Identify the source of the rivalry and re-establish respectful boundaries

Background Context: Intensely worried about global events (climate change war disease)
Treatment Goals: Focus efforts on controllable values-aligned actions and reduce news intake

Background Context: Loss of identity and purpose six months after retiring from a high-status job
Treatment Goals: Identify new activities that provide mastery and pleasure

Background Context: Avoids making or answering phone calls leading to complications
Treatment Goals: Use hierarchical exposure to making different types of calls

Background Context: Spends hours re-checking locks alarms and appliances before leaving the house
Treatment Goals: Reduce checking time by 5-minute increments (ERP)

Background Context: Small business owner working 80+ hours a week leading to marital strain
Treatment Goals: Delegate tasks and establish clear non-negotiable personal time

Background Context: Had a panic attack at a concert and now avoids large public gatherings
Treatment Goals: Use interoceptive exposure (e.g. spinning) to reduce fear of physical symptoms

Background Context: Fears blushing in public leading to avoidance of bright lights or sensitive topics
Treatment Goals: Practice intentional exposure to situations where blushing might occur

Background Context: Experiences sudden intense emotional and visual flashbacks to past traumatic events
Treatment Goals: Learn grounding techniques to reorient to the present moment

Background Context: Couple constantly fights about spending habits and financial goals
Treatment Goals: Establish joint financial goals and a clear budget (Gottman principles)

Background Context: Lost a best friend suddenly and feels the world is unpredictable and unsafe.
Treatment Goals: Process the suddenness of the loss and rebuild a sense of safety

Background Context: Can fall asleep but wakes up at 3 AM and worries until morning
Treatment Goals: Use "mindfulness of worrying" to detach from early morning thoughts

Background Context: High school student tears up assignments if they are not flawless
Treatment Goals: Submit work that is "good enough" rather than spending excessive time re-editing

Background Context: Experiences transient suicidal thoughts during moments of extreme distress
Treatment Goals: Use crisis survival skills (DBT) and reduce intensity of distress

Background Context: Obsessed with a single persistent symptom (e.g. mild tremor) despite medical clearance
Emotional State: Mentally fixated scared fatigued by worry
Treatment Goals: Practice habit reversal for symptom checking

Background Context: Adjusting to life outside of prison after a long sentence
Treatment Goals: Develop a structured daily routine and access community resources

Background Context: Feels worthless because they can no longer do physical activities due to chronic illness
Treatment Goals: Identify non-physical areas of worth (values) and practice self-validation

Background Context: Isolated themselves over years finding interaction too effortful
Treatment Goals: Schedule small consistent social engagements even if unpleasant initially

Background Context: Gets intensely angry when they perceive they are the subject of gossip or exclusion
Treatment Goals: Challenge personalized thinking and use assertive boundary setting

Background Context: Pain from an old work injury causes avoidance of most physical activities
Treatment Goals: Gradually increase movement based on graded exposure principles

Background Context: Young adult struggling to balance cultural expectations of family and modern life
Treatment Goals: Identify which values from each culture they want to honor

Background Context: Obsessed with minor scars on their body believing others stare at them
Treatment Goals: Practice exposure to wearing clothing that reveals the scars

Background Context: New parent feels emotionally flat and lacks a connection with their infant
Treatment Goals: Use behavioral techniques to increase interaction and skin-to-skin contact

Background Context: Having auditory hallucinations. Voices accuse him of being “a failure.”
Emotional State: Low mood, delusions of guilt, social withdrawal.
Treatment Goals: Psychiatric evaluation, antipsychotic medication adherence, CBT-p (cognitive therapy for psychosis).

Background Context: High-achieving student constantly checks phone/internet when they should be studying
Treatment Goals: Use structured time management (e.g. Pomodoro) and block distractors

Background Context: Adult child relies heavily on parents financially causing resentment
Treatment Goals: Establish a realistic time-bound plan for financial independence

Background Context: Retiree spends hours reading news about impending global catastrophes
Treatment Goals: Limit news exposure to one slot per day and focus on local community activities

Background Context: Developed severe depression after a long-term relationship ended
Treatment Goals: Re-engage with social activities and challenge self-critical thoughts about worth

Background Context: Avoids social gatherings where food is present due to past ED/fear of judgment
Treatment Goals: Separate social anxiety from ED fears and use exposure to social eating

Background Context: Obsessed with performing religious rituals perfectly and confessing minor sins repeatedly
Treatment Goals: Reduce ritualistic prayer/confession and accept human imperfection

Background Context: Senior manager constantly stressed about company performance
Treatment Goals: Delegate tasks and prioritize family/leisure time over work obligations

Background Context: Fears being trapped in elevators impacting work in a high-rise building
Treatment Goals: Use gradual exposure (starting with short empty elevator rides)

Background Context: Avoids necessary medical procedures (vaccinations blood tests) due to extreme fear
Treatment Goals: Use Applied Tension technique and systematic exposure

Background Context: Struggles to form close relationships due to deep inability to trust others after trauma
Treatment Goals: Gradually increase vulnerability and practice challenging protective walls

Background Context: Couple where one partner avoids physical intimacy due to past sexual trauma
Treatment Goals: Improve emotional safety and communication before addressing physical intimacy

Background Context: Couple grieving a late-term miscarriage and struggling to support each other
Treatment Goals: Validate each partner's unique grief process and improve communication

Background Context: Body feels constantly "on alert" and they cannot relax enough to sleep
Treatment Goals: Use progressive muscle relaxation and deep breathing techniques before bed

Background Context: Obsessed with having a perfectly clean home leading to intense cleaning rituals
Treatment Goals: Set time limits on cleaning tasks and tolerate a small amount of mess

Background Context: Reacts to all constructive criticism with intense defensiveness and anger
Treatment Goals: Practice recognizing criticism as information not attack

Background Context: Spends hours disinfecting household surfaces and food due to fear of germs
Emotional State: Anxious exhausted by rituals worried about illness
Treatment Goals: Reduce disinfecting behaviors (ERP) and accept realistic germ exposure

Background Context: Children left home followed by initiation of divorce proceedings
Treatment Goals: Focus on defining a personal identity outside of the roles of spouse and parent

Background Context: Constantly compares their life/looks to curated social media feeds
Treatment Goals: Reduce social media usage and focus on real-life achievements and relationships

Background Context: Passively waits for things to get better without taking action
Treatment Goals: Identify small self-directed actions to take daily regardless of feeling

Background Context: Becomes angry when situations or people do not adhere to their strict expectations
Treatment Goals: Challenge core beliefs about the necessity of control and practice flexibility

Background Context: Experiences TMJ pain and frequent tension headaches linked to stress
Emotional State: Tense limited frustrated by lack of control
Treatment Goals: Use mindfulness to observe physical tension without reacting to it

Background Context: Struggling to adapt to the unstructured nature of civilian life after military service
Treatment Goals: Establish new routines and structures that provide a sense of order

Background Context: Obsessed with a specific body part (e.g. abdomen) uses excessive dieting/exercise
Treatment Goals: Challenge the core belief linking self-worth to body appearance

Background Context: Experienced depression with first child fears it returning with the second
Treatment Goals: Proactive monitoring of mood and early implementation of coping strategies

Background Context: Experienced a violent home invasion/robbery leading to fear of the home environment
Treatment Goals: Use cognitive restructuring to regain a sense of safety in the home

Background Context: Delaying a large important project due to the need for flawlessness
Treatment Goals: Break the project into tiny non-perfect steps and commit to the process not the outcome

Background Context: Teenager repeatedly breaking house rules (curfew screen time) and lying
Treatment Goals: Establish clear enforceable consequences and improve parent-teen communication

Background Context: Scientist overly worried about the validity and success of their research
Treatment Goals: Implement 'worry scripts' to challenge feared outcomes and focus on process goals

Background Context: Depression with high anxiety leading to avoidance and paralysis
Treatment Goals: Use behavioral activation techniques while managing high-arousal anxiety

Background Context: Struggles to give honest feedback to subordinates due to fear of confrontation/dislike
Treatment Goals: Practice giving gentle structured low-stakes feedback to others

Background Context: Intrusive thoughts about being a morally bad person or sexualized thoughts
Treatment Goals: Use ERP to tolerate the intrusive thoughts without seeking neutralization

Background Context: Carrying all financial marketing and operational stress of a startup alone
Treatment Goals: Identify key tasks to delegate and establish clear "off" hours

Background Context: Frequent panic attacks while stuck in heavy traffic leading to avoidance of commuting
Treatment Goals: Use controlled exposure to stressful traffic conditions with relaxation techniques

Background Context: Avoids balconies cliffs and glass floors (Acrophobia variation)
Treatment Goals: Use VR exposure therapy and cognitive work on overestimating danger

Background Context: Believes that all negative events in their life are fundamentally their fault
Treatment Goals: Challenge the internal working model of self as 'bad' or 'faulty' (CFT)

Background Context: Couple trying to repair relationship after infidelity from years ago but memories still surface
Treatment Goals: Focus on rebuilding the narrative and practicing radical acceptance of the past

Background Context: Parent whose last child moved out struggles with the loss of their primary role
Treatment Goals: Find new roles and passions to define this stage of life

Background Context: Persistent pattern of falling asleep late and waking up late causing conflict
Treatment Goals: Use bright light therapy and strict wake-up time to shift circadian rhythm

Background Context: Overly critical and judgmental of friends and partners leading to relationship strain
Treatment Goals: Practice cognitive defusion from judgmental thoughts and focus on compassion

Background Context: Uses food and bingeing as a primary way to cope with intense unwanted feelings
Treatment Goals: Learn DBT skills (Distress Tolerance) as alternatives to emotional eating

Background Context: Obsessively checks temperature blood pressure and heart rate throughout the day
Treatment Goals: Implement strict rules to reduce checking frequency and time

Background Context: Recently diagnosed with a progressive chronic illness and struggling to adapt
Treatment Goals: Accept the reality of the illness and focus on valued living (ACT)

Background Context: Feels they must constantly achieve to earn acceptance from others
Treatment Goals: Challenge the belief that love is conditional on performance

Background Context: Chronic low mood characterized by pervasive boredom and lack of interest
Treatment Goals: Schedule varied activities that provide mild stimulation or challenge

Background Context: Experiences intense anger and frustration when technology fails or is slow
Treatment Goals: Identify the cognitive error and practice frustration tolerance

Background Context: Suffers from frequent debilitating migraines exacerbated by environmental triggers
Treatment Goals: Use mindfulness to accept the pain and identify non-avoidance coping

Background Context: Wants to re-engage with life after trauma therapy but feels overwhelmed by possibility
Treatment Goals: Establish new meaningful goals aligned with post-trauma values

Background Context: Obsessed with their height or size (e.g. hands feet) being 'wrong'
Treatment Goals: Challenge the social belief that specific dimensions equal worth

Background Context: Overwhelmed by the need to be the "perfect parent" leading to constant stress
Treatment Goals: Reduce self-imposed standards and increase acceptance of 'good enough' parenting

Background Context: Experienced a break-in; fear of being alone at home and exaggerated startle response
Treatment Goals: Use structured exposure to being alone in the house (safety planning)

Background Context: Delays necessary tough conversations indefinitely
Treatment Goals: Use solution-focused questioning to clarify next steps and commitment

Background Context: Parents struggling to motivate their depressed teenager to attend school or socialize
Treatment Goals: Implement small behavioral contracts and focus on validating teen's feelings

Background Context: Spends hours planning and mentally rehearsing possible future catastrophes
Treatment Goals: Use cognitive defusion techniques to let thoughts pass without engagement

Background Context: Developed depression after a medical condition led to a significant loss of bodily control
Treatment Goals: Focus on areas where they still have agency (e.g. daily choices self-care)

Background Context: Avoids using buses or subways due to fear of observation and judgment by strangers
Treatment Goals: Use graded exposure to eating in public settings

Background Context: Intrusive unwanted thoughts about their sexual orientation or gender identity being "wrong"
Treatment Goals: Practice ERP by accepting the uncertainty of the thought content

Background Context: Therapist/social worker struggles with the emotional burden of clients' suffering
Treatment Goals: Establish stronger boundaries between work and personal life

Background Context: Fears feeling trapped and unable to escape in densely crowded areas
Treatment Goals: Use gradual exposure to crowded spaces combined with controlled breathing

Background Context: Extreme fear of certain insects leading to excessive checking and avoidance outdoors
Treatment Goals: Use image and video exposure to the feared insect

Background Context: Engages in constant harsh self-criticism often echoing abuser's voice
Treatment Goals: Use Compassion-Focused Therapy techniques to cultivate a gentle inner voice

Background Context: In a relationship where the partner is consistently invalidating and controlling
Treatment Goals: Define healthy boundaries and explore options for relationship safety

Background Context: Lost a cherished pet and experienced lack of validation from family/friends
Treatment Goals: Validate the depth of the attachment and loss process the lack of support

Background Context: Becomes anxious and physiologically aroused *before* even getting into bed
Treatment Goals: Practice relaxation techniques 30 minutes before entering the bedroom

Background Context: Avoids starting complex tasks because the required effort for perfection is too high
Treatment Goals: Break down tasks into tiny measurable non-perfect steps

Background Context: Engages in impulsive behaviors (e.g. cutting hair quitting jobs) during mood swings
Treatment Goals: Use the "STOP" skill (DBT) to interrupt impulsive actions

Background Context: Obsessively monitors minor non-threatening internal pain sensations
Treatment Goals: Reduce body scanning behavior and tolerate the sensations (ACT/ERP)

Background Context: Moved for a dream job but struggles intensely with culture shock and loneliness
Treatment Goals: Build social network through structured activities and validate transition stress

Background Context: Ruminates endlessly on past failures defining current self by those mistakes
Treatment Goals: Practice self-forgiveness and refocus on current values and actions

Background Context: Fails to express needs or desires in relationships leading to resentment and low mood
Treatment Goals: Practice expressing needs assertively in low-stakes situations

Background Context: Becomes intensely angry and critical when partner doesn't follow their advice/plan
Treatment Goals: Challenge the belief that they know best for everyone else

Background Context: Pain is heavily influenced by stress and emotional state which they resist acknowledging
Emotional State: Resistant frustrated focused on physical cause
Treatment Goals: Learn to observe the connection between emotion and physical sensation (MBCT)

Background Context: Struggling to reconcile professional identity with traditional family background
Treatment Goals: Identify and define personal values independent of family/culture expectations

Background Context: Feels they are never muscular enough despite being physically large/fit
Treatment Goals: Reduce ritualistic exercise and challenge the definition of a "perfect" physique

Background Context: Depression is worsened by a partner who dismisses their feelings as "hormones"
Treatment Goals: Teach the partner validation and communication skills (Gottman/IPT principles)

Background Context: Witnessed a suicide; struggles with intrusive images and questions of fault
Treatment Goals: Use cognitive processing therapy (CPT) to challenge the guilt and self-blame

Background Context: Subconsciously avoids completing tasks that would lead to a promotion/increased responsibility
Treatment Goals: Explore the underlying fear of visibility or increased pressure

Background Context: Couple dealing with family stress and criticism due to their inter-racial marriage
Treatment Goals: Use systems approach to manage family boundaries and create a unified couple culture

Background Context: Small-scale farmer constantly worried about weather pests or market collapse
Treatment Goals: Focus on controllable steps (e.g. maintenance) and practice letting go of outcome

Background Context: Severe depression with slow movement speech and difficulty completing tasks
Treatment Goals: Focus on behavioral scheduling and increasing basic self-care activities

Background Context: Avoids any situation where they might blush leading to social restriction
Treatment Goals: Use exposure therapy to situations where blushing is likely accepting the flush

Background Context: Constantly asks family members for reassurance about past actions or future worries
Treatment Goals: Reduce the number of times reassurance is sought per day (ERP)

Background Context: Difficulty separating work from life when work is always available in the home office
Treatment Goals: Establish a strict workday schedule and a dedicated workspace ritual

Background Context: Fears having a panic attack while driving on the highway leading to restricted routes
Treatment Goals: Use gradual controlled exposure to short highway drives with a safety person

Background Context: Avoided all dental care for decades leading to severe dental issues
Treatment Goals: Use systematic desensitization and guided relaxation to approach the dental office

Background Context: Often feels disconnected from their body or surroundings during high stress
Treatment Goals: Learn grounding techniques (5-4-3-2-1) to re-engage with the present moment

Background Context: Past unresolved trauma causes one partner to react explosively to minor triggers
Treatment Goals: Identify triggers and communicate past trauma needs to the current partner

Background Context: Grieving a family member with severe dementia (physically present cognitively absent)
Treatment Goals: Validate the unique sadness of ambiguous loss and focus on quality moments

Background Context: Dependent on sleep aids and cannot sleep without them
Treatment Goals: Develop a plan to gradually wean off medication while practicing CBT-I techniques

Background Context: Spends too much time on low-priority tasks neglecting important complex ones
Treatment Goals: Use the 80/20 rule and prioritize high-impact tasks

Background Context: Intense feelings quickly followed by deep self-hating shame and withdrawal
Treatment Goals: Use self-compassion to soften the shame response after emotional events

Background Context: Hypersensitive to any internal sensation quickly escalating it into a health crisis fear
Emotional State: On-edge mentally busy fearful of symptoms
Treatment Goals: Practice mindful observation of bodily sensations without judgment (ACT)

Background Context: Leaving a stable career in their 40s to pursue a new creative path
Treatment Goals: Use MI techniques to explore commitment to the new path despite fear

Background Context: Feels constantly inadequate at work despite being highly skilled
Treatment Goals: Challenge the core belief "I am not enough" using evidence

Background Context: Believes that nothing they do will ever improve their life or mood
Treatment Goals: Identify and challenge fatalistic all-or-nothing predictions about the future

Background Context: Avoids expressing anger leading to chronic resentment and passive-aggression
Treatment Goals: Learn to identify and express anger directly and assertively

Background Context: Pain intensity increases significantly when stressed which is then ignored
Emotional State: Frustrated dismissive of emotional link limited
Treatment Goals: Use cognitive restructuring to challenge beliefs about the source of pain

Background Context: Struggling to adjust to loss of privacy and change in household dynamics after parent moves in
Treatment Goals: Establish new boundaries and communication rules within the family unit

Background Context: Obsessed with the appearance of their hands hiding them in social situations
Treatment Goals: Practice exposure by performing tasks that require visible hands

Background Context: Intrusive exaggerated thoughts about infant death or harm
Treatment Goals: Use CBT to challenge catastrophic thinking and reduce checking behaviors

Background Context: Experienced several non-related traumas over a lifetime leading to chronic dysregulation
Treatment Goals: Use sequenced trauma processing (TF-CBT principles) to address each event

Background Context: Struggles with initiation and completion of necessary non-stimulating life tasks
Treatment Goals: Use external structuring visual cues and accountability partners

Background Context: Parents struggling to manage and support a teenager who is self-harming
Treatment Goals: Learn validation skills and implement DBT-informed crisis management

Background Context: Worries constantly about things outside of their control (e.g. plane crashes global politics)
Treatment Goals: Practice 'letting go' of external control and focusing on personal agency

Background Context: Wakes up early (3-4 AM) and is unable to return to sleep
Treatment Goals: Use sleep restriction and cognitive control to consolidate sleep time

Background Context: Intensely nervous and avoidant of speaking to bosses police or teachers
Treatment Goals: Use role-playing (CBT) to practice confident communication with authority

Background Context: Obsessed with the idea they may have accidentally hit someone while driving
Emotional State: Guilty compelled to re-trace routes distracted
Treatment Goals: Use ERP to tolerate the uncertainty without re-checking routes

Background Context: Customer service worker must maintain a cheerful facade despite being treated poorly
Treatment Goals: Set clear emotional boundaries with customers and practice emotional detachment

Background Context: Fears that the physiological symptoms of exercise will trigger a panic attack
Treatment Goals: Use interoceptive exposure to simulate symptoms safely

Background Context: Avoids annual flu shots and necessary blood work due to extreme fear
Treatment Goals: Use Applied Tension technique and systematic exposure

Background Context: Pushes people away when they get too close due to deep-seated fear of betrayal
Treatment Goals: Explore the function of the 'pusher' dynamic in relationships (Psychodynamic)

Background Context: One partner hides debt and spending from the other leading to trust breakdown
Treatment Goals: Establish radical transparency and joint financial planning

Background Context: Grieving the loss of a young adult child to overdose
Treatment Goals: Process the complicated grief including the loss of the future and the circumstances

Background Context: Mind races with endless repetitive thoughts when trying to sleep
Treatment Goals: Use cognitive defusion and meditation to quiet the mind before bed

Background Context: Spends excessive time on grooming rituals to feel 'acceptable'
Treatment Goals: Reduce grooming time incrementally and accept a less-than-perfect appearance

Background Context: Holds onto old resentments causing mood to sour and relationships to decay
Treatment Goals: Learn to process and release anger healthily rather than storing it

Background Context: Experiences rapid mood swings and intense fear of abandonment. History of non-suicidal self-injury during relational stress.
Treatment Goals: Dialectical Behavior Therapy (DBT) principles — distress tolerance, mindfulness, interpersonal effectiveness.

Background Context: Highly social person bored and restless after retirement from a busy job
Treatment Goals: Identify new social and meaningful volunteer opportunities

Background Context: Feels unworthy of love or attention due to self-perceived physical flaws
Treatment Goals: Challenge the societal standards of beauty and focus on self-acceptance

Background Context: Lives day-to-day without setting goals or planning for the future
Treatment Goals: Use solution-focused therapy to identify a small desired future state

Background Context: Becomes irrationally angry when they perceive any form of injustice or unfairness
Treatment Goals: Challenge the core belief that the world *must* be fair/just

Background Context: Constantly fights against the reality of their pain leading to emotional distress
Treatment Goals: Use mindfulness and ACT commitment strategies to reduce the struggle with pain

Background Context: Young adult overwhelmed by the responsibilities and demands of their first full-time job
Treatment Goals: Learn time management boundary setting and self-validation skills

Background Context: Obsessed with the color or tone of their skin using excessive products/procedures
Treatment Goals: Reduce camouflaging behaviors and challenge underlying racial or social anxiety

Background Context: Depression and anxiety from the loss of a strong romantic connection post-baby
Treatment Goals: Use IPT to clarify new roles and improve communication with the partner

Background Context: Experienced severe prolonged bullying by a superior resulting in hypervigilance at work, presents self-injury for pain relief
Treatment Goals: Use CPT to challenge cognitive distortions

Background Context: Stalls on minor daily decisions (what to eat what to wear) due to fear of the "wrong" choice
Treatment Goals: Practice making quick low-stakes decisions without over-analysis

Background Context: Parents disagree on the amount and frequency of financial support given to adult children
Treatment Goals: Establish clear family rules and boundaries around financial aid for adult children

Background Context: A high school student suffering from long-term bullying and isolation in school, poor self-image. Withdrawal from peers, difficulty expressing emotions, disordered eating patterns. Use minor self-injury activities to reduce pain
Treatment Goals: Emotional awareness, connecting to safe peers, building self-concept, resilience skills.

Background Context: Depression secondary to managing a severe lifelong chronic disease
Treatment Goals: Focus on increasing pleasure and mastery activities despite physical constraints

Background Context: Person remains silent in all group settings despite having valuable input
Treatment Goals: Practice speaking up with short simple statements in low-stakes group settings

Background Context: Spends hours showering and changing clothes after touching perceived 'dirty' surfaces
Treatment Goals: Use ERP to touch feared items and delay/reduce cleansing rituals

Background Context: Human resources manager overwhelmed by mediating conflicts and high emotional demands
Treatment Goals: Establish strong professional boundaries and emotional self-care practices

Background Context: Had a panic attack in a small room and now avoids all small enclosed spaces
Treatment Goals: Use gradual exposure to progressively smaller/more enclosed spaces

Background Context: Extreme fear of birds avoiding parks and outdoor seating areas
Treatment Goals: Use systematic desensitization starting with distant photos of birds

Background Context: Engages in punishing behaviors (e.g. extreme dieting overworking) after perceived failures
Emotional State: Self-critical driven by guilt low self-worth
Treatment Goals: Practice self-compassion and challenge the need for self-punishment

Background Context: One partner is overly dependent and the other is overly responsible leading to imbalance
Treatment Goals: Define and practice healthy boundaries and personal autonomy

Background Context: Grieving the loss of a neighbor and friend in a sudden tragic accident
Treatment Goals: Process the traumatic nature of the death and rebuild a sense of safety

Background Context: Persistent pattern of falling asleep late and waking up late causing conflict
Treatment Goals: Use bright light therapy and strict wake-up time to shift circadian rhythm

Background Context: Believes they must perform perfectly in intimate situations leading to performance anxiety
Treatment Goals: Focus on enjoyment and connection rather than evaluation/performance

Background Context: Withdraws completely and refuses to communicate when emotionally overwhelmed
Treatment Goals: Learn to use assertive communication and 'time-out' requests rather than shutting down

Background Context: Obsessively checks for lumps or abnormalities and demands frequent screening tests
Treatment Goals: Reduce body checking and tolerate the inherent uncertainty of cancer risk

Background Context: Finished school but feels lost unable to commit to a career path living at home
Treatment Goals: Identify core values and align short-term goals with those values

Background Context: Interprets every neutral social cue as a sign of rejection or dislike
Treatment Goals: Challenge the assumption of rejection and practice mind-reading errors (CBT)

Background Context: Struggles with intense mental and physical inertia making even simple tasks feel impossible
Treatment Goals: Break tasks into micro-steps and use momentum to increase activity

Background Context: Quickly becomes enraged by slow drivers tailgaters or minor traffic infractions
Treatment Goals: Use deep breathing and cognitive restructuring

Background Context: Frequent severe tension headaches linked directly to financial and work stress
Treatment Goals: Use mindfulness and stress reduction techniques to lower baseline tension

Background Context: Struggling with anxiety and fear after recently coming out to an unsupportive family
Treatment Goals: Build a strong supportive non-family social network

Background Context: Obsessed with the size and shape of their legs only wearing baggy clothes
Treatment Goals: Practice wearing more revealing clothing (ERP) and challenging the self-criticism

Background Context: Experiences intense graphic intrusive thoughts about harming the baby (without intent)
Treatment Goals: Use ERP to expose to the thoughts without neutralizing or seeking reassurance

Background Context: Experienced severe property damage and loss due to a flood; now fears rain/water
Treatment Goals: Use imaginal exposure to the flood event and gradual exposure to water/rain sounds

Background Context: Avoids large multi-step tasks that feel overwhelming or mentally demanding
Treatment Goals: Use task decomposition (breaking down tasks) and visual scheduling

Background Context: Parents constantly fighting with their teen over excessive video game use/screen time
Treatment Goals: Establish clear collaborative technology rules and monitor implementation (O)

Background Context: Intensely anxious about all medical appointments demanding excessive testing/reassurance
Treatment Goals: Reduce pre-appointment preparation/research and limit questions to the doctor

Background Context: Struggling with low mood and lack of pleasure after achieving sobriety
Treatment Goals: Identify new sober activities that align with long-term values

Background Context: Avoids eating at restaurants because of the intense anxiety of speaking to the server
Treatment Goals: Use graded exposure to ordering increasingly complex items from the menu

Background Context: Believes that if they do not perform a specific mental ritual a bad thing will happen to a loved one
Treatment Goals: Use ERP to stop the ritual and tolerate the discomfort/fear of catastrophe

Background Context: In a high-pressure sales job with impossible targets leading to constant anxiety
Treatment Goals: Identify cognitive distortions about success/failure and set work boundaries

Background Context: Fears being trapped in crowded high-speed elevators (combination of fears)
Treatment Goals: Use controlled exposure starting with standing near a closed elevator door

Background Context: Avoids driving over large bridges or elevated highways
Treatment Goals: Use virtual reality exposure to bridge driving and challenge safety behaviors

Background Context: Difficulty distinguishing their own emotional state from the emotional state of others (merging)
Treatment Goals: Learn to identify and own their internal emotional experience (DBT)

Background Context: Couple with low sexual desire that causes conflict and misunderstanding
Treatment Goals: Use Gottman Method principles to improve communication around intimacy needs

Background Context: Caring for a parent with a long slow terminal illness struggling with exhaustion
Treatment Goals: Validate the sadness and focus on maximizing positive time together now

Background Context: Uses late-night hours for intense work/study leading to difficulty winding down
Treatment Goals: Implement a strict "no work after X hour" rule and a wind-down ritual

Background Context: Obsessively analyzes every expense and investment leading to extreme financial anxiety
Treatment Goals: Practice accepting 'good enough' financial decisions and set limits on analysis time

Background Context: Escalates arguments quickly leading to relationship explosions and subsequent guilt
Treatment Goals: Learn validation skills and non-escalatory communication during conflict

Background Context: Spends hours daily researching symptoms and self-diagnosing on the internet
Treatment Goals: Implement strict limits on internet symptom searching (ERP)

Background Context: Recently became a single parent struggling with financial and emotional load
Treatment Goals: Identify support networks and set realistic co-parenting goals

Background Context: Believes they are "damaged" or fundamentally flawed because of past trauma
Treatment Goals: Use CFT techniques to build self-compassion and challenge the trauma narrative

Background Context: Avoids social gatherings and new activities because of the anticipation of failure/discomfort
Treatment Goals: Schedule small mildly challenging social or novel activities (BA)

Background Context: Constant low-grade anger due to perceived unfairness and incompetence of others
Treatment Goals: Challenge the demanding rigid beliefs about how others *should* behave (REBT)

Background Context: Avoids activity due to fear of pain leading to deconditioning and worsening pain
Treatment Goals: Use graded exposure to movement challenging the fear-avoidance cycle

Background Context: Left a demanding job to be a stay-at-home parent struggles with loss of professional identity
Emotional State: Lost overwhelmed anxious about the future
Treatment Goals: Identify new non-parenting goals and manage expectations about career return

Background Context: Obsessed with the alignment or color of their teeth avoiding smiling in photos
Treatment Goals: Reduce mirror checks and practice smiling in front of the mirror (ERP)

Background Context: Depression and anxiety stemming from the loss of a strong romantic connection with partner post-baby
Treatment Goals: Use IPT to clarify new roles and improve communication with the partner

Background Context: Experienced a random violent assault in a public place leading to fear of strangers
Treatment Goals: Use exposure (in imagination or real-life) to crowded public places

Background Context: Delays finishing a novel/major project due to fear it won't be "genius" enough
Treatment Goals: Set a deadline for the "shitty first draft" and commit to completion over perfection

Background Context: Parents struggling to manage a teenager who is experimenting with drugs/alcohol
Treatment Goals: Establish firm consistent rules and use MI to encourage teen's commitment to change

Background Context: Teacher constantly worried about job security student performance and admin demands
Treatment Goals: Use relaxation techniques (PMR) and challenge beliefs about personal responsibility

Background Context: Severe depression combined with heavy drinking as a coping mechanism
Treatment Goals: Focus on behavioral activation while concurrently addressing substance use triggers

Background Context: Avoids asking clarifying questions in professional or academic settings leading to mistakes
Treatment Goals: Practice asking 1-2 non-essential questions in every meeting (CBT exposure)

Background Context: Obsessively fears contamination by bodily fluids (urine blood etc.)
Treatment Goals: Use ERP to expose to non-threatening contamination and reduce cleaning rituals

Background Context: Working 70+ hour weeks in a fast-paced tech startup with aggressive deadlines
Treatment Goals: Prioritize time off and identify value-driven activities outside of work

Background Context: Increased awareness of normal body functions triggers panic attacks
Treatment Goals: Use interoceptive exposure to simulate symptoms safely

Background Context: Fears turbulence specifically making them unable to fly comfortably
Treatment Goals: Use exposure therapy (videos of turbulence) and cognitive restructuring on flight safety

Background Context: Pervasive feeling of being fundamentally flawed and unlovable
Treatment Goals: Use Compassion-Focused Imagery to build a sense of inner safety and worth

Background Context: Couple constantly in a cycle of control and resistance
Treatment Goals: Identify and respect each other's underlying needs and dreams (Gottman)

Background Context: Grieving the loss of their own health/mobility due to a sudden medical event
Treatment Goals: Process the loss of the 'former self' and adapt to the new reality

Background Context: Associates the bed with anxiety work and screens (not sleep)
Emotional State: Anxious frustrated mentally active in bed
Treatment Goals: Strictly apply Stimulus Control Therapy (only sleep/intimacy in bed)

Background Context: Believes they must be perfect because they doubt their basic ability to succeed otherwise
Treatment Goals: Challenge the need for constant validation through flawless performance

Background Context: Uses impulsive shopping and spending to regulate painful emotions
Treatment Goals: Use DBT 'pros and cons' for impulsive actions and identify coping alternatives

Background Context: Compulsively seeks medical appointments and tests alienating doctors and family
Emotional State: Worried dependent on external validation exhausted
Treatment Goals: Reduce reassurance-seeking behaviors (ERP) and accept uncertainty

Background Context: Struggling with the emotional aftermath and loneliness following the official end of a marriage
Treatment Goals: Focus on rebuilding a new life and self-identity post-marriage

Background Context: The inner voice is constantly criticizing and self-punishing mirroring a parent's voice
Treatment Goals: Use self-compassion letter writing and imagery to talk back to the inner critic

Background Context: Feels perpetually bored finding life and activities meaningless and monotonous
Treatment Goals: Explore philosophical values and commit to small meaningful contributions

Background Context: Highly reactive to their partner's attempts to control or micromanage them
Treatment Goals: Learn assertive boundaries and de-escalation skills during arguments

Background Context: Pain limits the ability to participate in valued activities (e.g. hiking gardening)
Treatment Goals: Use ACT to commit to valued action despite the presence of pain

Background Context: Struggling to define their role and boundaries as a new grandparent
Treatment Goals: Use Family Systems principles to negotiate new roles and respectful boundaries

Background Context: Obsessed with minor misalignment of teeth avoiding smiling and close conversation
Treatment Goals: Reduce mirror checking and practice social exposure (smiling)

Background Context: Intense anxiety and hypervigilance focused on the baby's breathing or sleep safety
Treatment Goals: Use CBT to challenge catastrophic thinking and reduce checking behaviors

Background Context: Witnessed an act of violence on a stranger; now has guilt and intrusive images
Treatment Goals: Use CPT to challenge the guilt over what they could/should have done

Background Context: Avoids large multi-step tasks that feel overwhelming or mentally demanding
Treatment Goals: Use task decomposition (breaking down tasks) and visual scheduling

Background Context: Parents frustrated by an adult child who constantly asks for money and refuses to work
Treatment Goals: Establish clear firm and consistent boundaries regarding financial support

Background Context: Constantly worried about the health and safety of their spouse and children
Treatment Goals: Challenge the belief that worry prevents bad outcomes

Background Context: Depression primarily maintained by extreme social isolation and lack of connection
Treatment Goals: Identify social values and schedule small consistent social contacts

Background Context: Avoids meeting people from dating apps due to fear of the "reveal" and judgment
Treatment Goals: Use graded exposure to dating (starting with simple text moving to short coffee dates)

Background Context: Compelled to touch things an even number of times or arrange things perfectly symmetrically
Treatment Goals: Use ERP to intentionally perform rituals unevenly and tolerate discomfort

Background Context: Special education teacher overwhelmed by emotional needs of high-demand students
Treatment Goals: Establish strong boundaries and increase self-compassion for imperfect results

Background Context: Only panics when in one specific building (e.g. old office specific store) now avoided
Treatment Goals: Use structured gradual exposure to the feared location

Background Context: Extreme fear of rodents leading to excessive checking for signs of them in the home
Treatment Goals: Use graded exposure to images/videos moving to toy/stuffed rodents

Background Context: Chronic emotional flatlining and inability to feel joy or connection after trauma
Treatment Goals: Use sensory awareness techniques to gently re-engage with feelings

Background Context: One partner harbors years of unexpressed resentment leading to sudden explosive arguments
Treatment Goals: Learn to express frustration assertively and immediately not store it

Background Context: Grieving the loss of a child to a chronic long-term illness
Treatment Goals: Validate the prolonged nature of the loss and the exhaustion of caregiving

Background Context: Lawyer who can't shut off their legal arguments and case concerns at night
Treatment Goals: Use a strict 'brain dump' or worry journal before the wind-down period

Background Context: Obsessed with being the 'perfect partner' (gifts gestures planning) leading to exhaustion
Treatment Goals: Challenge the need for constant flawless performance to maintain love

Background Context: Rapid intense shifts in mood from calm to despair or anger
Treatment Goals: Use self-monitoring (mood logging) to identify triggers and early warning signs

Background Context: Fear of contracting a specific rare tropical disease after a recent trip abroad
Treatment Goals: Reduce searching for symptoms of the rare disease and tolerate uncertainty

Background Context: Struggling with boredom social anxiety and life structure after achieving sobriety
Treatment Goals: Identify new sober social networks and meaningful leisure activities

Background Context: Constantly compares their career success and wealth to former peers
Treatment Goals: Challenge the belief that external achievements define self-worth

Background Context: Avoids challenging tasks which reinforces low mood and sense of failure
Treatment Goals: Set small achievable 'mastery' goals (BA) to break the cycle

Background Context: Blames all problems (traffic work relationships) on external factors/people
Treatment Goals: Challenge the need to externalize blame and take responsibility for reactions

Background Context: Pain flares up intensely after arguments or stressful emotional events
Treatment Goals: Learn emotion regulation skills to reduce the impact of stress on pain

Background Context: Struggling to respect the boundaries set by their adult children regarding the grandchildren
Treatment Goals: Use O principles to negotiate boundaries and offer support without interference

Background Context: Obsessed with acne or minor skin blemishes leading to excessive checking and picking
Treatment Goals: Reduce checking/picking rituals (ERP) and accept non-flawless skin

Background Context: Depression worsened by intense guilt about taking time for self-care
Treatment Goals: Challenge the belief that self-care is selfish and prioritize 1-2 small daily acts

Background Context: Experienced highly invasive or painful medical procedures as a child leading to phobia/anxiety
Treatment Goals: Use systematic desensitization and cognitive reprocessing of the memory

Background Context: Delaying studying for a high-stakes exam (e.g. Bar medical boards) due to fear of failure
Treatment Goals: Break the study material into small time-boxed non-negotiable blocks

Background Context: Parents of a child who is withdrawn and silent due to severe school bullying
Treatment Goals: Focus on validating the child's experience and collaborating with the school system (O)

Background Context: Freelance writer anxious about meeting deadlines and the quality of every article
Treatment Goals: Practice exposure to submitting work that is 'good enough' before over-editing

Background Context: Severe lack of interest motivation and emotional flatness
Treatment Goals: Identify value-based activities (ACT) and schedule small steps toward them

Background Context: Avoids applying for jobs due to the intense fear of the interview process
Treatment Goals: Use role-playing and cognitive restructuring to prepare for and face interviews

Background Context: Obsessed with needing to 'know' the outcome of every situation leading to excessive questioning/checking
Treatment Goals: Use ERP to tolerate ambiguity and resist asking for closure

Background Context: Paramedic struggling with constant exposure to trauma and lack of emotional decompression time
Treatment Goals: Implement structured debriefing and emotional boundaries between work and home

Background Context: Only panics when driving alone leading to reliance on others for transport
Treatment Goals: Use gradual exposure to short solo drives and self-soothing techniques

Background Context: Fears standing on the edge of high places (Intrusive thought component)
Treatment Goals: Use ERP to tolerate the intrusive thought without seeking mental neutralization

Background Context: Experiences shame and worthlessness stemming from long-term childhood criticism and neglect
Treatment Goals: Challenge the internal working model and cultivate a gentle inner voice (CFT)

Background Context: Couple struggling after one partner had a long-term emotional affair
Treatment Goals: Rebuild emotional transparency and set clear boundaries for non-physical intimacy

Background Context: Grieving the loss of a parent with whom they had a complicated estranged relationship
Emotional State: Conflicted sad guilty about lack of grief
Treatment Goals: Process the complicated grief and validate feelings

Background Context: Anxious thoughts and physiological tension immediately before getting into bed
Treatment Goals: Use progressive muscle relaxation and deep diaphragmatic breathing

Background Context: Obsessively tracks all food intake and exercise leading to anxiety about minor deviations
Treatment Goals: Challenge the belief that perfect adherence is necessary for health or worth

Background Context: Becomes intensely anxious and clingy when partners/friends show independence or distance
Treatment Goals: Learn distress tolerance and self-soothing skills when feeling abandoned

Background Context: Obsessed with the fear of having a sudden heart attack or stroke
Treatment Goals: Reduce checking behaviors and use cognitive restructuring to challenge risk perception

Background Context: Father struggling to find connection with his wife now that their shared focus is gone
Treatment Goals: Identify new shared interests and communication skills for the new marital phase

Background Context: Feels inadequate in their role as a manager constantly doubting their decisions
Treatment Goals: Challenge the 'imposter syndrome' belief and practice assertive decision-making

Background Context: Believes that nothing will ever truly change or improve in their life
Treatment Goals: Use Solution-Focused therapy to identify a small desired future state

Background Context: Swallows anger and frustration leading to outbursts of rage directed at objects or self
Treatment Goals: Learn to express frustration calmly and assertively as it arises

Background Context: Chronic knee pain leads to avoidance of walking increasing fear and disability
Treatment Goals: Use graded exposure to walking and physical activity (ACT principles)

Background Context: First-generation college student struggling with imposter syndrome and academic pressure
Treatment Goals: Build self-efficacy and access university support resources

Background Context: Obsessed with the texture or smoothness of their skin spending hours on treatments
Treatment Goals: Reduce compulsive treatments and accept natural skin variation

Background Context: Depression heavily exacerbated by extreme chronic sleep deprivation
Treatment Goals: Prioritize sleep consolidation and mild behavioral activation

Background Context: Was a passenger in a severe car crash and now has flashbacks and avoidance of cars
Treatment Goals: Use imaginal exposure and cognitive reprocessing of the crash event

Background Context: Constantly interrupted by notifications and switching between non-work tasks
Treatment Goals: Implement technology boundaries and structure

Background Context: Adult child lives at home with no job relying fully on parents for everything
Treatment Goals: Collaboratively develop an action plan and timeline for independence

Background Context: Person needs detailed schedules and plans panics when things change unexpectedly
Treatment Goals: Practice exposure to minor unplanned changes and tolerate ambiguity

Background Context: A 30-year-old, alternating between depression and mania. Discontinued medication; recent breakup triggered depressive episode.
Emotional State: Paranoid ideation, low mood, lack of self-care.
