Treatment Goals: Reinstating medication, psychoeducation, structured daily routine, social-skills support.

Background Context: Avoids professional networking events due to fear of small talk and judgment
Treatment Goals: Use graded exposure: simple greetings moving to short conversations

Background Context: Compelled to check doors windows and security systems repeatedly before sleeping
Treatment Goals: Reduce the checking ritual frequency and time (ERP)

Background Context: Receptionist handles constant customer complaints and maintains cheerfulness
Treatment Goals: Learn emotion regulation skills and externalize work stress

Background Context: Fears normal internal sensations (dizziness heart palpitations) will lead to fainting or illness
Treatment Goals: Use interoceptive exposure to simulate symptoms safely

Background Context: Extreme fear of large birds (e.g. geese swans) leading to avoidance of parks/lakes
Treatment Goals: Use systematic exposure (photos videos observation from a distance)

Background Context: Frequent episodes of feeling emotionally flat numb and disconnected from the body
Treatment Goals: Learn grounding and distress tolerance skills to manage dissociation

Background Context: Couple has frequent loud and damaging arguments that never resolve anything
Treatment Goals: Learn conflict de-escalation skills and constructive argument techniques (Gottman)

Background Context: Grieving the loss of a sibling to a long-term illness
Emotional State: Sad empty reflective on family history
Treatment Goals: Process the loss within the context of the family system

Background Context: Engages in elaborate long bedtime rituals that prevent consistent sleep
Treatment Goals: Simplify and shorten the bedtime routine (CBT-I Stimulus Control)

Background Context: Obsessed with receiving perfect performance reviews fears any critical feedback
Treatment Goals: Practice soliciting and accepting minor critical feedback without self-punishment

Background Context: Lashes out physically (hitting walls breaking objects) during intense frustration
Treatment Goals: Use distress tolerance skills (DBT) and assertive non-destructive expression of anger

Background Context: Avoids all news movies or conversations about illness leading to restriction
Treatment Goals: Use exposure to non-threatening media content about illness/hospitals

Background Context: Used to a highly rigid schedule struggling with retirement's unstructured time
Treatment Goals: Establish new meaningful daily routines and schedules

Background Context: Grew up with a chronically criticizing parent and now self-criticizes constantly
Treatment Goals: Use self-compassion letter writing and imagery to counter the inner critic

Background Context: Feels that life is fundamentally meaningless leading to long-term low mood
Treatment Goals: Explore values and commit to purposeful action in the present moment (ACT)

Background Context: Aggressive tailgating speeding and confrontation with other drivers
Treatment Goals: Use cognitive restructuring to challenge impatient/entitlement beliefs while driving

Background Context: Suffers from chronic undiagnosed full-body aches and fatigue
Treatment Goals: Focus on function and quality of life rather than solely on diagnosis

Background Context: Overwhelmed by the sudden financial and maintenance responsibility of owning a home
Treatment Goals: Learn to break down large problems and manage financial anxiety

Background Context: Woman obsessed with the perceived thinning of her hair leading to isolation
Treatment Goals: Reduce mirror-checking and hair-covering rituals (ERP)

Background Context: Depression fueled by the belief they are failing to meet the infant's constant demands
Treatment Goals: Challenge perfectionistic parenting beliefs and seek external support

Background Context: Relies on alcohol to manage intrusive memories. Engages in risky behavior after drinking.
Treatment Goals: Trauma-informed CBT, harm reduction, substance use support, emotional safety planning.

Background Context: Avoids completing projects that would lead to promotion fearing the spotlight and higher expectations
Treatment Goals: Explore the fears associated with increased success and visibility (Psychodynamic)

Background Context: Parents and adult child disagree fundamentally on life choices (career marriage location)
Treatment Goals: Negotiate respectful boundaries and validate each generation's viewpoint

Background Context: Constantly worries about making social faux pas or saying the "wrong thing" in conversations
Treatment Goals: Use exposure (CBT) to act naturally without seeking approval/reassurance

Background Context: Experienced past SAD and fears its recurrence leading to anticipatory sadness
Treatment Goals: Proactive use of behavioral activation and light therapy before winter onset

Background Context: Avoids speaking to their professor/boss leading to missed opportunities/clarification
Treatment Goals: Practice assertive communication and challenge beliefs about authority's judgment

Background Context: Compelled to perfectly arrange objects in their home before leaving or going to sleep
Treatment Goals: Use ERP to intentionally leave objects slightly misaligned and tolerate discomfort

Background Context: Nurse manager overwhelmed by staffing shortages and administrative tasks
Treatment Goals: Re-align daily tasks with core professional values and increase emotional detachment

Background Context: Fears having a panic attack in large open unavoidable spaces (e.g. stadium parking lot)
Treatment Goals: Use gradual exposure to large open areas combined with grounding techniques

Background Context: Avoids long high suspension bridges and elevated roadways
Treatment Goals: Use virtual reality exposure and cognitive work on safety estimation

Background Context: Chronic harsh inner critic constantly undermines self-worth and progress
Treatment Goals: Use Compassion-Focused letter writing and grounding techniques to quiet the critic

Background Context: One partner consistently withholds feelings and thoughts leading to distance and frustration
Treatment Goals: Learn emotional vulnerability and active listening skills (Gottman)

Background Context: Grieving the loss of a close professional mentor who was a key figure in their life
Treatment Goals: Process the loss of guidance and establish new internal sources of direction

Background Context: Lays awake worrying specifically about the consequences of not sleeping enough
Treatment Goals: Use paradoxical intention (try to stay awake) and cognitive control techniques

Background Context: Struggles to start tasks fearing they won't meet impossibly high internal standards
Treatment Goals: Commit to the "shitty first draft" principle and reduce the perceived cost of error

Background Context: Uses social withdrawal and isolation as the main coping mechanism for distress
Treatment Goals: Learn and practice alternative distress tolerance and social engagement skills (DBT)

Background Context: Obsessed with the fear of contracting HIV/AIDs after a perceived exposure event
Treatment Goals: Reduce checking behaviors and use ERP to expose to the feared contamination/thought

Background Context: Struggling with the shift from student identity to adult life with no clear direction
Treatment Goals: Use MI to clarify long-term goals and values and commit to action

Background Context: Believes they deserved the trauma they experienced due to deeply internalized shame
Treatment Goals: Use CFT to challenge the self-blame and cultivate inner protection

Background Context: Pervasive low mood and lack of initiative
Treatment Goals: Schedule activities that are slightly outside the comfort zone (e.g. mild novelty)

Background Context: Highly critical and aggressive while driving yelling at other motorists
Treatment Goals: Challenge the demanding beliefs and practice patience

Background Context: Pain flares up specifically during periods of high work or family stress
Treatment Goals: Use mindfulness and acceptance to manage the emotional components of pain

Background Context: Struggling with the emotional and logistical stress of their parents becoming frail and dependent
Treatment Goals: Establish clear roles and boundaries with siblings and parents (O)

Background Context: Obsessed with the symmetry of their face spending hours analyzing photos/mirrors
Treatment Goals: Reduce mirror checking and practice accepting asymmetry (ERP)

Background Context: Depression worsened by perceived lack of emotional and practical support from extended family
Treatment Goals: Use IPT to strengthen supportive relationships and communicate needs assertively

Background Context: Witnessed an act of workplace violence; hypervigilance and avoidance of the workplace
Treatment Goals: Use cognitive restructuring to challenge the belief that the workplace is inherently unsafe

Background Context: Delays submitting any work that will be judged (e.g. school papers expense reports)
Treatment Goals: Set small goals for submission and use feedback as data not judgment

Background Context: Parents dealing with a teenager who is consistently disrespectful and verbally abusive
Treatment Goals: Establish clear non-negotiable rules regarding respect and communication

Background Context: Developed severe depression after a prolonged debilitating physical illness
Treatment Goals: Use behavioral activation to increase engagement with life despite physical limitations

Background Context: Avoids meeting people from dating apps due to fear of the "reveal" and judgment
Treatment Goals: Use graded exposure to dating (starting with simple text moving to short coffee dates)

Background Context: Constantly asks family/partner if they look ill or healthy seeking validation
Treatment Goals: Reduce reassurance questions and tolerate the lack of external certainty (ERP)

Background Context: Special education teacher overwhelmed by emotional needs of high-demand students
Treatment Goals: Establish strong boundaries and increase self-compassion for imperfect results

Background Context: Had a panic attack on a crowded bus and now avoids all public transit
Treatment Goals: Use controlled exposure to bus rides starting with very short distances

Background Context: Fears being on tall buildings or rooftops impacting social and professional life
Treatment Goals: Use systematic desensitization to photos/videos of tall buildings

Background Context: Views people/situations as all good or all bad leading to unstable relationships
Treatment Goals: Learn 'dialectical thinking' (DBT) to accept complexity and shades of grey

Background Context: One partner avoids sexual intimacy due to unresolved past sexual trauma
Treatment Goals: Use trauma-informed principles to re-establish safety and non-demand intimacy

Background Context: Grieving the loss of a child who died by suicide
Treatment Goals: Process the complicated grief including the intense self-blame and unanswered questions

Background Context: Worry about work and finances prevents sleep initiation and maintenance
Treatment Goals: Use relaxation training and cognitive defusion to manage bedtime worry

Background Context: Links every minor mistake in daily life to a core belief of being fundamentally defective
Treatment Goals: Challenge the 'must be perfect' rule and practice self-acceptance

Background Context: Reacts to minor inconveniences (e.g. slow internet spilled coffee) with intense frustration/anger
Treatment Goals: Learn mindful observation of triggers and non-escalatory responses

Background Context: Obsessively checks moles skin or minor blemishes for signs of cancer
Treatment Goals: Reduce body checking rituals (ERP) and accept the normal risk of illness

Background Context: Moved to a large city for work but is struggling with intense loneliness
Treatment Goals: Identify and commit to structured social activities (e.g. clubs classes)

Background Context: Defined by the belief they are fundamentally 'weird' or 'unacceptable' due to childhood ostracism
Treatment Goals: Challenge the negative self-schema and cultivate self-compassion

Background Context: Pervasive low mood and an inability to start or finish any tasks or goals
Treatment Goals: Use small scheduled behavioral experiments to increase a sense of mastery

Background Context: Becomes angry when their attempts to manage or organize their partner's life are resisted
Treatment Goals: Challenge the belief that they are responsible for fixing or controlling others

Background Context: A working female who suffers constant tension at home; feels “invisible and powerless.” Panic attacks, compulsive over-apologizing, body image concerns. Use minor pain as emotional relief
Treatment Goals: Emotional regulation, boundary setting, grounding exercises, reframing self-worth.

Background Context: Overwhelmed by current political climate leading to avoidance of media and civic engagement
Treatment Goals: Focus on local actionable goals and limit exposure to overwhelming national news

Background Context: Obsessed with the size of pores or minor skin imperfections
Treatment Goals: Reduce mirror checking and challenge the self-criticism about skin texture

Background Context: Intense constant monitoring of the baby's safety leading to exhaustion and control issues
Treatment Goals: Use CBT to challenge the need for perfect control over the baby's environment

Background Context: Survivor of physical assault by a known person leading to chronic fear/hypervigilance around people they know
Treatment Goals: Use trauma processing to differentiate between the past abuser and current relationships

Background Context: Delays tasks that are boring or unstimulating (e.g. taxes cleaning paperwork)
Treatment Goals: Use the Pomodoro technique and external rewards for completing mundane tasks

Background Context: Adult child feels immense pressure from parents to achieve specific career/marital goals
Treatment Goals: Define personal values and communicate boundaries around life choices
